original_text:
Asgardian Stones
Informazioni generali
Software: NetEnt
Rulli: 5
Linee di gioco:20
Puntata minima: 0,20 €
Puntata massima: 200 €
Minimo gettoni per linea: 1
Massimo gettoni per linea: 10
Valore minimo gettone: 0,01 €
Valore massimo gettone: 1 €
Vincita massima: 500 gettoni
Return to Player (RTP): 96,3%
Caratteristiche principali
Asgardian Stones è una slot firmata NetEnt a 5 rulli e 20 linee di pagamento, ottimizzata per essere giocata anche da dispositivi mobili e con puntate che partono da 20 centesimi a giro
Con un tema basato sulla mitologia norrena e una grafica eccezionale, questo gioco prevede la funzionalità “Avalanche”, che permette di vincere più volte in un singolo giro.
L’attrazione principale di Asgardian Stone è la funzione Bonus Wheel, una sorta di ruota della fortuna, in cui puoi vincere premi in denaro e fino a 15 giri gratuiti!
Durante i free spins inoltre, puoi beneficiare dei simboli a cascata, che restano “bloccati” sui rulli in caso di combinazione non vincente, per tentare la fortuna con gli stessi al giro successivo.
Nel complesso si tratta di una slot molto ben congegnata in cui una grafica e degli effetti sonori davvero ben fatti fanno da cornice a un sistema di gioco altrettanto coinvolgente, con vincite che possono arrivare fino a 2000 volte la puntata.
Simboli normali e speciali
Nonostante lo sfondo di Asgardian Stones sia molto bello e realistico, i simboli sono un po’meno ricercati, per così dire. Quelli tematici infatti sono rappresentati da dei volti di pietra, che differiscono l’uno dall’altro solo per il colore: quelli che pagano di più sono i volti di pietra di colore verde e arancione.
Oltre ai simboli tematici, sono presenti anche i numeri e le lettere delle carte da poker dal 9 all’Asso, qui riprodotti come se fossero scolpiti nella pietra. Le carte da poker nelle dinamiche di gioco sono i simboli che pagano di meno in assoluto.
Il simbolo Wild è semplicemente una W, con funzione di jolly, mentre lo Scatter in Asgardian Stones è sostituito da una ruota della fortuna, che offre free spins e moltiplicatori, anche se non fa esattamente le veci di uno scatter tradizionale.
Special Features in Asgardian Stones
Numerose sono le funzioni speciali di questa slot machine:

I simboli a cascata: in caso di combinazione vincente, questi simboli si sostituiscono a quelli che l’hanno composta, andando potenzialmente a formare nuovi allineamenti che pagano, con una sorta di sistema di “vincita nella vincita”. Questa funzionalità è detta “Avalanche”.
Simboli Colossali: anche questi cadono dall’alto e possono “colpire” i simboli presenti sui rulli. In base a quanti simboli rompono, si ottengono dei moltiplicatori fino a 4x.
Ruota della Fortuna: la Bonus Wheel rappresenta in questo gioco la vera e propria attrazione! Si tratta di una sorta di simbolo gigante, che può coprire del tutto o in parte i cinque rulli. Offre dei ricchissimi moltiplicatori che vanno da un minimo di 80x, fino a un massimo di 400x, oltre a dare la possibilità di guadagnare fino a 15 giri gratuiti.

raw_translation.response:
Asgardian Stones: A Slot Game Review

If you're a seasoned gambler looking for a new exciting game to play, Asgardian Stones by NetEnt is a must-try. It's a 5-reel and 20-payline slot game that can be played on your mobile device. You can bet as little as 20 cents per spin, or as much as 200 euros if you're feeling lucky.

The game is based on Norse mythology and features stunning graphics and sound effects. The Avalanche feature allows you to win multiple times in a single spin, adding to the excitement.

But the real attraction of Asgardian Stones is the Bonus Wheel, a Wheel of Fortune-style feature where you can win cash prizes and up to 15 free spins! During the free spins, you can benefit from the cascading symbols that remain "locked" on the reels for the next spin if they don't result in a win.

Despite the beautiful and realistic background, the symbols in Asgardian Stones are a bit less elaborate. The stone faces represent the thematic symbols, distinguished only by their color. The green and orange faces pay the most. The numbers and letters of playing cards from 9 to Ace are also represented, carved into stone. These are the symbols that pay the least.

The Wild symbol is represented by a simple W, and the Scatter symbol is replaced by the Bonus Wheel. There are several special features to enjoy in this slot machine game, including the Cascading Symbols, Colossal Symbols, and the Bonus Wheel.

In summary, Asgardian Stones is a well-designed slot game with an immersive gameplay system, offering wins of up to 2,000 times your bet. So, why not enjoy the thrill of the game and try your luck today?

If you're a seasoned gambler looking for a new exciting game to play, Asgardian Stones by NetEnt is a must-try. It's a 5-reel and 20-payline slot game that can be played on your mobile device. You can bet as little as 20 cents per spin, or as much as 200 euros if you're feeling lucky.

The game is based on Norse mythology and features stunning graphics and sound effects. The Avalanche feature allows you to win multiple times in a single spin, adding to the excitement.

But the real attraction of Asgardian Stones is the Bonus Wheel, a Wheel of Fortune-style feature where you can win cash prizes and up to 15 free spins! During the free spins, you can benefit from the cascading symbols that remain "locked" on the reels for the next spin if they don't result in a win.

Despite the beautiful and realistic background, the symbols in Asgardian Stones are a bit less elaborate. The stone faces represent the thematic symbols, distinguished only by their color. The green and orange faces pay the most. The numbers and letters of playing cards from 9 to Ace are also represented, carved into stone. These are the symbols that pay the least.

The Wild symbol is represented by a simple W, and the Scatter symbol is replaced by the Bonus Wheel. There are several special features to enjoy in this slot machine game, including the Cascading Symbols, Colossal Symbols, and the Bonus Wheel.

In summary, Asgardian Stones is a well-designed slot game with an immersive gameplay system, offering wins of up to 2,000 times your bet. So, why not enjoy the thrill of the game and try your luck today?

response.headline: Symbols and Paytable

It has the power to substitute for all other symbols, except for the Scatter symbol. Speaking of which, in Asgardian Stones, the Scatter symbol is replaced by the Bonus Wheel symbol. Land three of them anywhere on reels 1, 3, and 5, and you'll trigger the ever-so-exciting Bonus Wheel Feature. It feels like such a good time that you might even start doing little dances around the kitchen table.

response.headline: Gameplay Features
response.content:
Get ready to enter the world of Norse mythology with Asgardian Stones! This 5-reel and 20-payline slot game is accessible on mobile devices and allows players to place bets for as little as 20 cents per spin. Not only are the graphics and sound effects stunning, but the gameplay features are sure to keep you entertained for hours.

The Avalanche feature is one of the standout features of the game. With each spin, symbols fall from the top of the screen instead of the reels spinning. If a winning combination is achieved, those symbols will disappear and new ones will fall in their place. This can result in multiple wins in a single spin, increasing your chances of hitting the jackpot.

But that's not the only exciting feature! Asgardian Stones also offers Colossal symbols, which are 2x2 or 3x3 symbols that can be formed by four or nine regular symbols. These symbols can lead to big wins, especially when combined with the Avalanche feature.

Overall, Asgardian Stones is a fantastic slot game that blends Norse mythology with modern gameplay features. Give it a spin and see if the gods of luck are on your side!

response.headline: Bonus Features
response.content:
Asgardian Stones is a slot game that takes us on an absolutely epic journey filled with gods, riches, and rock-solid entertainment. But, let’s get to what really matters – the bonus features.

The Bonus Wheel feature is the keeper of all the money and spins you could possibly wish for. It’s like having Odin himself as a personal slot machine assistant. Spin the wheel, watch the magical runes align perfectly in your favor and let the prizes flow! Plus, if you’re lucky enough, you might trigger the 15 free spins bonus game. That’s like having two Thor’s hammers instead of just one.

If you’re not the kind to settle for mere cash prizes, then Asgardian Stones has got you covered. During free spins, any cascading symbols that don’t result in a win will be carried over to the next spin. It’s like having a never-ending supply of free rocks for your rock collection, except these rocks can earn you riches beyond your wildest dreams.

But wait, there’s more! Cascading symbols also come with their own Colossal Symbols feature. And no, that’s not just a fancy name for giant symbols – it’s an enchanting characteristic of the game that turns some symbols into massive, whopping 2x2 and 3x3 Colossal Symbols. It’s like having the mighty Thor on your side and nothing (not even Loki) can stand in your way.

response.content:
Prepare to be blown away by the jaw-dropping graphics and crystal-clear sound effects of Asgardian Stones! This game has spared no expense in creating an immersive and attention-grabbing Norse mythology theme. With sky-high mountains and cascading waterfalls, you'll feel as though you're exploring the frozen tundras of Scandinavia.

But don't worry, you're not alone on this adventure. You'll be accompanied by vividly detailed Norse gods and goddesses, each with their unique charm and personality. And if you listen closely, you just might hear the satisfying crunch of ancient stones being shattered by powerful kicks, punches and crushing defeats.

As far as sound goes, Asgardian Stones has really raised the bar. The music will have you on the edge of your seat as you spin the reels, with each note building the thrill to an inevitable crescendo. And the sound effects are unparalleled. With deep, booming voices and lightning crackling in the background, it's like you're in the middle of a raging storm - without having to leave the comfort of your own home.

Review:
 
Asgardian Stones Slot Game Overview

Asgardian Stones by NetEnt is a 5-reel and 20-payline slot game that takes players on a journey into Norse mythology. The game can be played on mobile devices and offers varying betting options, from bets as low as 20 cents to as high as 200 euros.

Gameplay and Features

Asgardian Stones features an Avalanche gameplay system, allowing players multiple chances to win in a single spin. The cascading symbols remain 'locked' on the reels for the next spin if they don't result in a win. The game also features Colossal Symbols that can cover up to 9 positions on the reels and Bonus Wheel that awards cash prizes and free spins.

Bonus Wheel Feature

The Bonus Wheel is Asgardian Stone's main attraction, offering players a Wheel of Fortune-style feature where they can win cash prizes and up to 15 free spins. During the free spins, players can benefit from the cascading symbols that remain 'locked' on the reels for the next spin if they do not result in a win. The Bonus Wheel can be triggered by landing the Bonus Wheel symbol on the last three reels of a spin.

Symbols and Paytable

The symbols in Asgardian Stones are themed around Norse mythology, with stone faces representing the higher-paying symbols, while numbers and letters of playing cards make up the lower-paying symbols. The Wild symbol is represented by a simple 'W,' and the Scatter symbol is replaced by the Bonus Wheel symbol.

Winning Potential

Asgardian Stones offers wins of up to 2,000 times your bet, making it a high-paying slot game. With varying betting options and multiple chances to win within a single spin, Asgardian Stones offers players an immersive and entertaining gameplay experience.
